trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that act as containers for a collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 公開方法與屬性，以支援控制項的作用如同子項目集合容器使用的使用者介面自動化用戶端存取。

trans-unit.source: The children of this element must implement <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableItemProvider"></xref> and be organized in a two-dimensional logical coordinate system that can be traversed (that is, a UI Automation client can move to adjacent controls) by using the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目之子系必須實作<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableItemProvider"></xref>並組織成可周遊的二維邏輯座標系統 （也就是使用者介面自動化用戶端可以移至相鄰的控制項） 使用鍵盤。

trans-unit.source: This control pattern is analogous to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> with the distinction that any control that implements ITableProvider must also expose a column and/or row header relationship for each child element.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項模式相當於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider>相反地，任何實作 ITableProvider 的控制項也必須公開每個子項目的資料行和/或資料列列標頭關聯性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider>

trans-unit.source: Controls that implement ITableProvider are also required to implement <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> so as to expose the inherent grid functionality of a table control.
trans-unit.target: 實作 ITableProvider 控制項也必須實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider>以公開固有的方格控制項的功能資料表。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider>

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>control patterns.
trans-unit.target: 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern>和<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>控制項模式。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of UI Automation providers that represents all the column headers in a table.
trans-unit.target: 取得 UI 自動化提供者的集合，代表資料表中的所有資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: A collection of UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者的集合。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of UI Automation providers that represents all row headers in the table.
trans-unit.target: 擷取使用者介面自動化提供者代表資料表中的所有資料列標頭的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者的集合。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the primary direction of traversal for the table.
trans-unit.target: 擷取主要資料表周遊的方向。
